lyric:
[00:00.000] 作词 : Chambers, Williams
[00:11.750]Send someone to love me.
[00:14.500]I need to rest in arms.
[00:18.000]Keep me safe from harm.
[00:20.500]In pouring rain.
[00:24.000]Give me endless summer.
[00:27.060]Lord I fear the cold.
[00:30.240]Feel I'm getting old.
[00:32.810]Before my time.
[00:36.560]As my soul heals the shame.
[00:42.310]I will grow through this pain.
[00:48.370]Lord I'm doing all I can.
[00:54.250]To be a better man.
[00:55.550]
[01:00.810]Go easy on my conscience.
[01:04.250]Cause it's not my fault.
[01:07.310]I know I've been taught.
[01:09.870]To take the blame.
[01:13.120]Rest assured my angels.
[01:16.930]Will catch my tears.
[01:19.620]Walk me out of here.
[01:22.310]I'm in pain.
[01:25.750]As my soul heals the shame.
[01:31.810]I will grow through this pain.
[01:37.620]Lord I'm doing all I can.
[01:43.370]To be a better man.
[01:50.750]Once U've found that lover you're homeward bound
[01:55.930]Love is all around.
[01:59.060]Love is all around.
[02:02.810]I know some have fallen on stony ground.
[02:08.000]But Love is all around.
[02:14.180]Send someone to love me.
[02:17.190]I need to rest in arms.
[02:20.870]Keep me safe from harm.
[02:23.560]In pouring rain.
[02:26.560]Give me endless summer.
[02:29.690]Lord I fear the cold.
[02:32.810]Feel I'm getting old.
[02:35.680]Before my time.
[02:38.870]As my soul heals the shame.
[02:45.370]I will grow through this pain.
[02:51.180]Lord I'm doing all I can.
[02:56.990]To be a better man.
